venue.name: Roots and Wings Yoga and Healing ArtsCenter

item.description:
An Evening of Gratitude and Appreciation as a benefit for A Place to Turn

With the Thanksgiving holiday approaching, I felt inspired to have an evening where we end our week and move into the holiday week immersing ourselves into all that we have to appreciate and be grateful for.

We'll be doing 3 guided meditations, directing you to appreciate in deep, heart-felt ways, in areas you might tend to take for granted or neglect, and to leave you feeling blissfully good and abundant.

I also felt inspired to use this evening as a benefit to share with others in need.  We'll be accepting financial donations, as well as non-perishable foods and clean, in-good-condition clothing for A Place to Turn, which provides emergency food and clothing to those in need in about 30 towns in Metro West, MA.  They are in great need right now, with the holidays and winter months coming up.  This is totally voluntary.  No pressure.  If you feel inclined, please bring what you'd like to donate.

There's no better way to bring more abundance into your life than by appreciating what you have and feeling abundant, even enough to share with others.

Even so, come just to feel good!  Really good.


This event is a public, non-meetup, community event, co-sponsored by New Possibilities Coaching and Roots and Wings Healing Arts Center as a community service.  You're being invited because of it's relevancy to being an effective deliberate creator with the Law of Attraction.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be downstairs in the Roots studio (either come in back door of bldg. or go down stairs towards back of first floor)

group.name: "Good Vibrations" Metro West Law of Attraction Community

item.name: Free community evening of guided meditations on gratitude and appreciation
